title: with peeling wallpaper, piles of wigs and broken floorboards
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price shocked fans with the appearance of her mucky mansion in her vlog earlier this week.

And now the former glamour model, 41, has allowed the cameras inside to show how it looks as it gets rennovated.

The £2million Horsham house has been stripped bare as the builders take over to do it all up.

The wallpaper is peeling, piles of junk clutter the rooms and broken floorboards look in urgent need of repair.

All the furniture has been moved out and just a few of Katie's belongings still remain in the house, which she's not currently staying in.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

It is a far cry from state of the house when she posted a video of it on Monday night.

There were endless bin bags full of her possessions and graffiti on the walls.

In her stables, which she admits are "full of c***", are cobwebs and a pile of bird poo where a nest had been made.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

She even had suitcases full of her saucy underwear gathering dust.

Katie admitted the mess gave her a "headache" as she said she wouldn't even know where to begin in tidying it up.

The mum-of-five moaned: "It's exhausting to know where to start, which room which pile.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

"I don't need these clothes and I'm always saying what can I wear? Where do I start?

"It just gives me a headache to be honest."

We revealed how Katie's son Junior was too "embarrassed" by the mess to stay over at his mum's.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

Instead, he preferred to be at dad Peter Andre's spotless home.

The source said: "He was so embarrassed by the mess and preferred Peter's cleaner house.

"He is like any teenage boy and embarrasses easily so he just didn't visit the house.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

"He still saw his mum but wouldn't stay overnight because he just couldn't stand the mess.

"Junior also needed to get to school and Katie not driving meant it was more difficult to get around."

Katie and all five of her kids aren't living in the house while it gets done up.
description: The £2million Horsham house has been stripped bare as the builders take over to do it all up
